blog.content:
# Course for beginners ECMASCRIPT 6

Hello friends, welcome to this new post entry, I am glad you are here because I want to show you the basics of ecmascript 6 with basic examples and some tips that will help you maintain good practices, I have decided to do it on video for a more dynamic learning and so on. At the same time polishing my English I will upload the complete series with the vimeo api, here you will find the updated playlist and without loss of quality, be aware of my next entries.

# Look at this Video:
